# dismiss(in:)

**Type Method**

Dismisses an App Store overlay.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func dismiss(in scene: UIWindowScene)
```

## Parameters

- **scene**: The window scene used to display the overlay.
title: dismiss(in:)
